name: Puzzle & Dragons Z
description:
Puzzle & Dragons Z is a puzzle game developed by GungHo. It came out on 10-03-2013. GungHo published the game.
You can play Puzzle & Dragons Z on iOS, Nintendo 3DS and Android.
It was produced by Daisuke Yamamoto. Naoki Fukuda, Takayuki Takahara and Yoshimasa Yamada directed the game. It was scored by Keigo Ozaki, Kenji Ito, Toshiko Tasaki and Yukio Nakajima.
